title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Instructional Design for Technology-Assisted Teaching for Children with Communication Disorders

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain participatory technology design processes that reflect the characteristics of children with communication disorders
Learners can propose clinical-based design solutions by applying a collaborative model with speech-language pathologists (SLPs)
Learners can design prototypes of communication support tools using mobile technology and incorporate evaluation feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
